00018 /*
00019  * Context.h
00020  *
00021  *
00022  *  Created on: 23-Dec-2010
00023  *      
00024  */
00025 
00026 #ifndef CONTEXT_H_
00027 #define CONTEXT_H_
00028 
00029 #include "boost/unordered_map.hpp"
00030 #include <string>
00031 
00032 using namespace std;
00033 using namespace boost;
00034 
00035 //!An object that maintains the context for the executing code
00036 /**
00037  * This is a Singleton object that maintains a context
00038  * for the executing code. It contains a list of properties
00039  * stored as a key-value map
00040  *
00041  * All the flags defined are made available through this
00042  * object. It can also be used as a mechanism for message
00043  * passing. This reduces coupling between the code and
00044  * gflags.
00045  */
00046 class Context {
00047 public:
00048     static Context& get_instance();
00049 
00050     //!Get an integer valued property named key
00051     int get_int(string key);
00052     //!Get a string valued property named key
00053     string get_string(string key);
00054     //!Get a double valued property named key
00055     double get_double(string key);
00056     //!Get a bool valued property named key
00057     bool get_bool(string key);
00058 
00059     //!Put a string value for property key
00060     //!into the map
00061     void put_string(string key, string val);
00062 
00063 private:
00064     Context();
00065     virtual ~Context();
00066 
00067     static Context* _instance;
00068     unordered_map<string, string> _flags;
00069 };
00070 
00071 #endif /* CONTEXT_H_ */
